title: Path of raft with fan blowing

content.question: The toy raft shown in the top view above is sliding due east on frictionless ice at constant speed v0 when a fan blows on its sail, producing a constant acceleration a directed to the north. Which of the following could indicate the path of the raft while the fan is blowing?

choices.label: A directional arrow curves up to the right and then rises steeply in a northern direction
A directional arrow curves down to the right and then drops steeply in a southern direction
A vertical directional arrow directed north
A horizontal directional arrow directed east
A straight directional arrow rising at a right angle to the northeast

content.answer: A directional arrow curves up to the right and then rises steeply in a northern direction
